People

The members of the OSCG

-> Join us!

Join us! to help promote open scholarship practices at your institution.

Senior Lecturer, School of Mathematics, Statistics and Applied Mathematics
National University Ireland Galway
Interests Numerical analysis, Scientific computing, Equality + Diversity + Inclusion in Higher Education, Open Education Resources and Tool

Lecturer English and Media Studies
National University Ireland Galway
